name: DRUNKEN MANOR ADVENTURE
description:
You, the player, and your girlfriend Lily wanted a getaway adventure full of excitement and adventure. You call off work on a Thursday and look at Airbnbs. There is a certain place available that was rated three stars, but you and Lily are very much intrigued. The place is called Haunted Manor. Neither you or Lily are scared of ghosts, so you book the vacation.

Upon arrival, you both begin to drink Heineken beers to your heart's desire. 

You wake up the next morning to find out Lily is gone...
